description: Short written report evaluating lighting parameters and scene information modeling. Involves data collection, analysis using R software, and writing results/discussion sections of a scientific research report.
Computer-aided lens design task using simulation software to create optical systems. Graded on simulation accuracy and responses to theoretical/practical concepts in optical system design.
Field measurements of luminance/illuminance followed by problem-solving applications of lighting concepts. Includes quiz component on lighting evaluation principles.
2-hour exam with short answer, multiple choice, essay and problem-solving questions covering all course content (OCT, Confocal Microscopy, lens design, lighting evaluation).
